name: Mitigation Playbook for Web Application Command Execution Incident
description: This playbook addresses an incident where unauthorized commands were executed on a web server due to a vulnerability.

action--d2cdbd2b-f9f0-4f99-bf96-84c55bb6.name: Kill malicious process
action--d2cdbd2b-f9f0-4f99-bf96-84c55bb6.description: Terminate the malicious process associated with the dropped backdoor.

action--bc73c5c4-d3f4-4df2-ade1-cc5e9b96.name: Remove dropped backdoor file
action--bc73c5c4-d3f4-4df2-ade1-cc5e9b96.description: Delete the backdoor file to prevent further unauthorized access.

loop--f72d7623-8920-4328-bd2c-620da58c46.name: Scan and remediate host for vulnerabilities
loop--f72d7623-8920-4328-bd2c-620da58c46.description: Perform a security scan on the host and remediate vulnerabilities until clean.

action--f72d7623-8920-4328-bd2c-620da58c.name: Run security scanner
action--f72d7623-8920-4328-bd2c-620da58c.description: Execute the security scanner to check for vulnerabilities.

loop--fa823c04-c77b-4c26-9e54-f6a8230a3f.name: Check and revert suspicious file permissions
loop--fa823c04-c77b-4c26-9e54-f6a8230a3f.description: Make sure that sensitive file permissions are correctly set.

action--fa823c04-c77b-4c26-9e54-f6a8230a.name: Revert file permissions
action--fa823c04-c77b-4c26-9e54-f6a8230a.description: Set correct permissions on sensitive files.

action--e4817b9b-9ad8-42db-b1e4-ed06b455.name: Update firewall rules to block malicious IP
action--e4817b9b-9ad8-42db-b1e4-ed06b455.description: Block the malicious IP to prevent further attacks.
